title: Reunion Find: Beta Worldline
comments: Harder version of Reunion Find from PCPC '24
Intended solution is persistent DSU with an implicit array
You can place comments here. They will not be processed.
Leave valid_subtasks blank to make a binary problem.
If you need a custom checker, add the field: checker.
There are also a couple of builtin checkers.
For a custom checker template, see:
